website_summaries.verdict: Smaller hand truck ideal for lightweight jobs around the house or office.
pros: Weighs in at a mere 6.9 lb
When folded, it can easily fit in a closet or trunk of a car
Aluminum material is lightweight but durable
cons: Some customers commented that this hand truck bends easily under heavier loads

customer_reviews.title: Wheel exploded
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last 4 months. I haul 90 lbs on it and the wheel basically exploded...
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a while to write a review. I am not impressed with this hand truck. I am a tall person and the extension doesn't lift as high as I would like to make it comfortable for me to use. Also, the locking mechanism for the handle extension is very flimsy and doesn't keep extended easily, I am often finding myself pulling the arm back out to extended. I would recommend spending a bit more on another product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget is great, I used it to move a portable air ...
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great, I used it to move a portable air condition (still in box weighing 67 lb), a kitchen table and chair set ( still in box a little over 70 lbs) down my porch steps, across a 15-20 ft section of yard (mucky because of melting snow) and across a gravel driveway to get them into the basement for storage for when I move. Obviously being female I took 1 item at a time and my new friend did great. Although I wish the hand extension was longer it was sturdy enough to help me get it done. It folds up super compact for storage which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: trason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stores away nicely when not using
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Quality construction, easily folds and unfolds, and holds up to 150 pounds. Friends who see it want to know where to get one for themselves. I ordered it for my wife to use in her business. She needed to load and unload a cart. The carts were falling apart and we had to replace them all the time. The hand truck takes all the rolling punishment and handles it easily. My wife loves it and uses it for other things too.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Wayne

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS FOLDING HAND TRUCK. YOU DO NEED TO UNDERSTAND ITS LIMITATIONS.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see the small package this hand truck arrived in. It is delightfully compact, light weight, and easy to set up. I have only used it once but I am thus far pleased with it. It folded up nicely after use. It claims to be able to carry 150 pounds but I wouldn't ever carry that much weight on it. Just with transporting a case of drinking water (24 bottles) the handle seemed to give a bit and seemed stressed. It will serve my purposes since I don't ever plan on transporting anything heavier than one or two cases of water and other smaller items. It is a great hand truck providing you understand its limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfect until last week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart in March of 2018 and until last week, it was really awesome. Unlike other hand cart that have wheels that bow in, this cart didn't and it worked well for what I needed it to do. Unfortunately that ended and now it won't pull up/extend. If you're up for purchasing a new one every couple years then this is the cart for you. If you're looking for a LONG term cart then keep on looking.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little truck, BUT light duty only.
customer_reviews.text: I need to move an ocassional 25# boxe across the parking lot. This beats carrying them. A $100 hand tuck would be taller and easier to use--and more expensive. Not for heavy use, not for constant use. Folds and collapses easily for storage or transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not replaceable if it does not work!
customer_reviews.text: After one use the Right wheel will mot turn. I contacted them and they were to replace but never did. Second time I contacted they said it's one piece and cannot replace and directed me to try and get Amazon to refund me! After months of waiting in them it now too late to to request refund from Amazon! This item in one piece and no parts can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Weakness in handle shafts
customer_reviews.text: At the end of April, I bought this because we had just moved and thought it would be useful. I found it easy to use, although we didn't use it very much, maybe 6 times. My 79 year old significant other attempted to bring in a box of groceries and the handle shafts bent.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a barrington

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a small footprint when folded.
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this, I see many lightweight hand trucks. Some look more heavy duty, but this one is fine for the things I need to move. I use it in the house and the garage. I move things like boxes filled with books and heavy grocery items, like sodas. I like that I can fold it up small and carry it in my car. I've also used it for bags of garden dirt and compost.
customer_reviews.author: MDSmith

customer_reviews.title: The hand cart is light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this back because I tried opening and closing several times and the back wheel first does not open properly then stays crooked. I am afraid the wheel will bust under regular weight like the pictures of some others in the comment section. Also, because of the wheel being crooked the cart does not roll easily. The cart does not seem durable to me. Too many plastic parts to keep the weight down but if you use it to move even 100lbs. I am afraid it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I loved it... until it broke!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little hand truck - I used it to ferry boxes of books to a Little Free Library I have set up. Probably about 50 pounds on average, no more. A rivet that holds the wheel to the frame has broken and a piece is missing. I suppose it can be fixed by some piece of hardware from the store, but really.... should I have to fix something that is about 3 months old, and which was never operated anywhere near the stated maximum weight? (the return window has closed, doncha know....). Don't buy this one, there must be a better one out there.
customer_reviews.author: suzyf921

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight folding cart that I haven’t figured out how to fold. Handle easy to shorten, but still doesn’t quite fit under jewelry bench. Seems sturdy. I take jewelry (design & fabrication) lots of metal, tools, papers. Also silversmithing -x heavy hammers, stakes, metals. This helps my shoulders & back. Good big wheels. I expect durability. After all, made by Seville.
customer_reviews.author: PINON

customer_reviews.title: I Honestly Enjoy Using It
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a road trip and need to haul a valuable 45lb. box in and out of places. I bought a hook strap to go with this. I honestly feel pretty good pulling this cart out of the trunk, loading the box onto it, wrapping the strap around the box and handles, and just wheeling it around. I don't push its durability, but it's good enough to go over some small bumps. The bed is not long at all and it is a little short, so extra care needs to be taken. But once its job is done, it folds up discreetly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cart but handle is too short for comfortable pulling.
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonably heavy duty cart. The base folds and the handle retracts to make it compact. The base when extended sort of clicks into place. The only thing I don’t like is that when you’re pulling the cart the handle is too short and you have to bend over to pull it. I’m 6 feet and have fairyl long arms. You might want to carefully review the dimensions for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Beans

customer_reviews.title: Has worked flawlessly with repeated heavy use. Very good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I am a wine sales rep and have to deliver several cases of wine with this hand truck. It has worked flawlessly and so far is very durable. Good quality for the price. Have loaded 3 cases of wine on it (about 100 lbs) and it worked fine. Can't ask for more than that from a collapsible unit.
customer_reviews.author: bill barbour

customer_reviews.title: Foldable Dolly
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dolly! It folds up nicely and VERY easily. I keep it in my car for whenever I have to pick up boxes for work. I am 5'7 and the handle is nice, although I wish it was a tad bit longer. For the price, this foldable dolly does the job! Packaging, on the other hand, was awful, but that's another story....
customer_reviews.author: KaCake

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard for me to open and close; otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lannin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our move
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. It is light weight and easy to use. I used it to move three small boxes of books and was worried about the weight of the books but it worked just fine. The wheels are a good size and I was able to easily collapse it to put away. Handle length is great. I am 5'4 and husband is 5'10 and we both used it comfortably with the adjustable handle. Perfect for our move!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyK

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I used this cart for a very big move as well as my daily grocery shopping (when I get cases of water and soda). It’s amazing! People have complained about the handle bending or it falling apart, but I have had no such experience. During the move I had well over 150 lbs on this and it did just fine! I’ve made multiple 90 lb trips and it’s as good as new. Super glad I invested in this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this for moving stuff around my home
customer_reviews.text: I love this for moving stuff around my home. Great for taking large amounts of trash to the dumpster. Have used this to move some really heavy items that I can't actually lift myself and it stood the test. I love how flat it folds down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: YeahBooks

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing has been a lifesaver! I originally bought it to take those huge 42 pound bags of cat litter from my car up to my apartment, but I find myself using it all the time. It’s small and lightweight, but super sturdy. I stack 4 of the 42 pound bags of cat litter on it and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cart is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It fits the bill for my use of carting my range bag for classes I teach. It folds a little stiffly - I think I'll hit it with the needle oiler from gun lubricating use and see how that does. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Heller

customer_reviews.title: this is a compact very effective hand truck & dolly
customer_reviews.text: I carried cartons and heavy items without a problem I wish they had a strap attachment that could connect to the dolly when you are using this on stairs to hold the item from shifting. You can't beat the ease and storing of the dolly
customer_reviews.author: walter h lapham

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two right off the bat, and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two right off the bat, and they are both extremely hard to open. I am desperately hoping they ease up as time goes on but looking at the mechanism I don't see how that will be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use it to move a large flower pot and it didn't work! I don't think it can haul 150lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Amsden

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me 😎
customer_reviews.text: I use this when going on my weekend trips to Disney when bring food and items to the resort. It also was used for a recent move I did it is real a life saver it save time and your back. It’s not the best you can get but has paid for itself over Ann them some
customer_reviews.author: Wingnuter (Hardliner,FL,NJ,PA)

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases you will make! I purchased to aid in my move. The movers used it and piled a lot of heavy boxes on it and it didn't break. I keep it around the house for moving boxes and other things that I don't want to lift. It easily folds and slips in any corner or between boxes. Super convenience and excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TammyB

customer_reviews.title: Great product - excellent delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little ride for my book boxes and other heavy things during my recent move. And it folds up into a low-profile package that's easy to store anywhere. Thank you so much for the prompt service and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Wryter

customer_reviews.title: Get one for you
customer_reviews.text: Got my wife one of these for bringing things to the conferences and meetings she attends and liked it so much I got one for me. It takes up very little space in the back of the car and I will just leave it there. Seems hefty enough. I use it mostly to carry cases of water to keep in my work locker.
customer_reviews.author: DIY and Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: There handle is not long enough and it is impossible to roll. I had 2 cases of water on it and it was difficult to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Corvino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trolley.
customer_reviews.text: The trolley just came in, and although I haven't used it, I'm very pleased. Great workmanship, design and easy to fold out. Great buy too.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H. Laurino

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty lifting
customer_reviews.text: The handle seems kind of flimsy. I wish I had invest in a sturdier cart. The plus is that is fold up and is more compact then some models. It is hard to fold up and snaps together; watch your fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Sbook

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat flimsy, has that suitcase feel that makes you think the handles going to snap when lugging anything over 50lbs but so far it's holding up. I'm a track & field guy and use it to lug around 80-100 pounds of shot puts and discus. Wish the wheels were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL M

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this to take bales of boxes up to the road for recycling pick up, it goes down 7 steps and over gravel and uneven pavers very well, works great for how we use it, sturdy enough to handle the bales of boxes
customer_reviews.author: carr895

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Broke after a couple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The telescoping handle separated. When you extend the handle only one side stays attached. I had used this less then a dozen times prior to it breaking. Before it broke, it was a decent hand truck. I use it to carry around a small folding table and light weight chair.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Rolls very nicely with heavy objects on it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and light. It rolled very smoothly even with 80lb (I did not try any more) weight. Folding mechanism is also very good once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: PDR

customer_reviews.title: Get something sturdier!
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold the weight it claims to hold. This is rather fragile and trying to put anything on it that is remotely heavy is not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Tomeka R

customer_reviews.title: not great for doors
customer_reviews.text: it can NOT go upstairs, even small bumps like going through a door it will have major problem with
customer_reviews.author: Rickey hoang

customer_reviews.title: OK, could be stronger
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected .... Opens well ... WHEELS seem too weak; especially going up/down steps .... Does the job with 60 - 70 lbs ... used with bungee cords to hold boxes on hand truck. Have used for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: very helpful when im doing heavy deliveries. i believe it even can handle more than 150lbs as i am certain i put more than that on there. this is a must have if you travel or carry heavy items or parcels almost daily. excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Thus added us in our mive so so nice. It has been kept in my van now ...
customer_reviews.text: Thus added us in our mive so so nice. It has been kept in my van now we purchased some bunker cords cause our new house sits high up and we have 5 steps cut into hill then 5 steps into house so loading up a few cases of water and a few bags on it makes dragging all those groceries a snap for my husband. We also took it to pick up a Table set st Walmart. Husband used it to pull out our stove. Little gem
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great product has definitely worked wonders for me.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in very handy during my little delivery jobs! I have been blindsided before by having to deliver some wine and when I went to pick it up it was things that were much heavier than expected. Where I had to haul it 1-2 blocks to my car. This has made it so much easier to manage...
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT ***
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of those... Both with little use get defformed and can't retract anymore... Bad material
customer_reviews.author: antonio monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Wheels do not fully open or close when open or closed. Wheels do not spin freely without weight on them. For the price not good value.
customer_reviews.author: James Jard

customer_reviews.title: Base too small to hold most boxes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger base, all the boxes I put on this were too small, they all just tipped forward. Did no good, so I returned
customer_reviews.author: tonya m.

customer_reviews.title: I initially purchased this for a quick move. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this for a quick move. It came in handy as I was able to move 3 large boxes at a time. I would move a couple of boxes, then fold it up and leave it in the car for the next run. I now keep this in my car at all times. Whenever I need to move anything relatively large, I'll use it. I've also stacked luggage on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: JoeKnows

customer_reviews.title: Yup, handle should be about 6” longer
customer_reviews.text: But otherwise works as advertised. I can attest that it handles 75lbs over uneven ground w/ ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for a the smart
customer_reviews.text: So smart and ready to pack in our small car when we need to move our daughter in and out dorms/apts. Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.author: Scott's girl

customer_reviews.title: Little Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. I used it when i moved all my stuff from a 2nd floor. Very durable and extremely compact when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver/Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ease a cross country move - the last time I made a similar move my back was sore for months and ultimately I had to go to physical therapy. This was the best investment ever - not only for my health, but it immensely sped up the loading/unloading of the car on either end.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fleury

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Folds well, durable, wheels have to be small to go so flat. Back issues forced me to use on boxes
customer_reviews.author: lu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small Yeti Roadie
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find wheels for my Yeti Roadie . This was the best option I could find. Wheels don’t roll great over rocks but for its size the dolly works perfect. Use it to roll Yeti from kitchen to trunk of car. It was great after my hernia surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell123

customer_reviews.title: A life saver! I have a mobile bartending business ...
customer_reviews.text: A life saver! I have a mobile bartending business and often need to carry heavy boxes of sodas, liquor, etc and this saves time and my back!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn LaShay

customer_reviews.title: Great workhorse for my second job hauling teaching materials and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great workhorse for my second job hauling teaching materials and I DON'T baby it. I load it up and it takes it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've purchased in a while. I love to garden in pots and bought it to help me move my heavy pots around. Absolutely works like a charm! Folds up out of the way when I don't need it and unfolds quickly when I do. Now I don't have to ask for help to move anything. Can't go wrong with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Truck
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in a Hand Truck...I can't utilize it without the bulkiness of a commercial hand truck...it's not heavy to lift and easy to store being a fold up unit...
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom so she could wheel her weed killer around the yard. She can’t carry the weed killer and can’t do the back pack ones so this was the resolution. Very sturdy and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Z

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheerleader box
customer_reviews.text: We got this dolly for our daughter to cart her big heavy wooden cheerleader box on. It's very easy to use and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: thomas flowers

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact small and very handy for small heavy items. Quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Roge

customer_reviews.title: this Folding is great for moving small to medium items around in our ...
customer_reviews.text: this Folding is great for moving small to medium items around in our house. It folds up and is easy to to store. I use it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: CEdG

customer_reviews.title: invest in bunge straps to go with it
customer_reviews.text: able to put small carrier, cat carrier, litter box all in one trip
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect thing. it is very durable and folds flat to fit in car or slide under something for storage if needed. It holds quite a bit at one time too.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have around.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed product. It folds compactly. Use of aluminum makes it both sturdy and light.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: It is just right for household moving and soo easy to store!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made hand truck.
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck meets my need to haul a 40 lb cargo to and from my destination weekly. I wish it were a little lighter. Also, when you wrap your bungee cords around the collapsable handle, it won't collapse. Minor problems both. I would recommend this hand truck to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Onehorse1

customer_reviews.title: It collapses to about the size of the base plate and the wheels fold in which makes it perfectly easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to transport my craft fair totes from the car to the booth. It collapses to about the size of the base plate and the wheels fold in which makes it perfectly easy to store. Retractable handle works well. Easy open and close using your feet.
customer_reviews.author: R.flewellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect assistant!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of binders to bring when I teach and this little guy makes easy work of hauling boxes from car to classroom. Folds up neatly too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Seams a little flimsy but so far nothubg has broken. I do put a lot of weigh on it
customer_reviews.author: Lusochka

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! Saves his back. Very compact when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy considering it's light weight
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy considering it's light weight. Used it to haul three stacked boxes of Mardi Gras beads without any problem. I used two pieces of bungee cord with end hooks to keep the load from shifting. It folds to the compact size shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving stuff easier
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is light. I like that it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Neatest little hand truck!
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest, handiest little hand truck I have ever seen. Sturdy, but no too heavy. Folds up flat and short. Wheels fold right into cart. You will not find a better cart than this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: ldj

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: A nice hand dolly, very compact and easy to store when folded, easy to fold and unfold. Not really for carrying large loads, but works well for its design.
customer_reviews.author: glacier3

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This little hand cart is great. I bought it for use of transporting things at Craft Shows. It is super light weight and easy to use when transporting all my items for shows. So glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harbeck

customer_reviews.title: If you need to move things This hand cart is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you need to move things This hand cart is the way to do it. Light and collapsible. I always keep it in the back of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A household staple.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait and use this before commenting. This works very well - easily folds up to a small compact size and has a fairly high weight capacity (150 lbs.) This is ideal for home use, perfect for moving boxes. I may even give one or two as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: best thing out there for price
customer_reviews.text: Its a touch short for myself who is 5'10 but for the price it's honestly the best thing out there
customer_reviews.author: kcihtred2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport, carries a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: I had to use the hand truck to transport a table, 2 chairs, 2 clear containers that included food and utensils, plates, glassware and linens and a cooler with no problem. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Well made. Great design. Love it . Ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: william palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wondered at first if this dolly is solid enough, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Miller Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Works great, quick, easy to operate, and very convenient, a little heavier than expected, but no problems, and great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. I used it to move house and it ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I used it to move house and it moved some big heavy furniture without breaking. Best part is it folds up and can live in the back of the closet without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although it is very portable and light weight the tongue is so small that anything I have tried to use it for kept falling off. Extend the tongue by 4-5 inches and it would be perfect for small hauling projects. All in all a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight very portable design.
customer_reviews.text: Very well thought out design. Performs well, folds flat and opens easily. When open, wheels lock in place automatically and seems ridged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and fits on the trunk of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Portable and strong enough to carry 150 lbs items. Easy to fold and fits on the trunk of my car!
customer_reviews.author: Cherryl

customer_reviews.title: A real back saver
customer_reviews.text: A real back saver - I use it to move 40 lb 5 gallon water bottles
customer_reviews.author: F&S

customer_reviews.title: A dolly with attitude.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised: well constructed, light weight, strong (150 lbs.) and it folds into a pretty small footprint. It's exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Montag

customer_reviews.title: And it's easy to store and carry around
customer_reviews.text: This did the job just right. And it's easy to store and carry around. I wouldn't use it for a piano or a heavy piece of furniture but I didn't buy it for that. So I can recommend this item for easy, somewhat light pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Really helps with moving heavy objects. Folds away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it to move my large plant and flower pots in and out of my lanai for potting and maintenance. Works great. Very sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not strong enough for carrying 2 packs of water , needs to do one by one
customer_reviews.author: Spot

customer_reviews.title: Compact & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to have. It's very sturdy and the foldable compact design is a definite plus. Fits in the trunk of my car easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I thought this item was great and perfect. But after less than 3 months of use carrying at most 75 lbs, in the middle of use the wheel broke... maybe not the best investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product for a reasonable price. I use it for potted plants and anything else needing relocation. It folds up easily and is so compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wife4Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works perfect for wheeling my tackle box and bucket for fish around
customer_reviews.author: Topher T.

customer_reviews.title: Folds up out of the way.
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is great for carrying stuff at one time. With a retaining strap, everything stays stable. For the price, you can't beat ti.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool at first, but broke super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Broke one day into use. Wheel snapped off (parts holding it together are plastic). Had to abandon it in the trash because I had to carry everything on it by hand. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: oscar padilla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but I feel like it would snap if I put the max load capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Ambilice

customer_reviews.title: Compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this to move kids in and out of college and it works perfectly, even for going up and down stairs. It folds up neatly so it can be stored in a dorm room or closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Seville Classics Folding Hand Truck & Dolly, 150 lbs. Capacity
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis heavy duty folding hand truck is ideal for in home or office use. With a capacity of 150 lbs, it facilitates carrying a heavy load. This durable yet light weight (only 6.9lbs) hand truck is made from heavy-duty aluminum and is equipped with 5-inch rubber wheels (no air needed) and can roll smoothly on nearly all types of surfaces. When in use (unfolded), this hand truck measures 15.35-inches by 16.54-inches and by 39.37-inches high (the fully extended handle conforms to almost any body height comfortably). When folded-up and compacted, the unit measures 15.35-inches by 2.36-inches and 25.2-inches high (with extendable handle retracted). The foldable and stow-away design allows for this item to be neatly tucked away in a closet or in your car for easy access when you need it most.
feature_bullets: Overall Dimensions: 15.35" D x 16.54" W x 39.37" H
Folded Dimensions: 15.35" D x 2.36" W x 25.2"
Made of aluminum to be heavy duty yet light weight
Toe Plate Size: 11.04" D x 15.35" W
